CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
CurrentVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - CMK (Customer Managed Keys) encryption support for data at-rest in Review sets
OldVersion.description: ,This release of eDiscovery features the implementation of customer-managed key (CMK) options, allowing users to manage their own encryption keys for the data stored in eDiscovery review sets in addition to the default, strong Microsoft-managed encryption already in place.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Sensitivity Bar in Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description:
,

Sensitivity bar provides a more prominent and contextual user experience for viewing and applying sensitivity labels in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. Outlook on the web will be rolling out the new sensitivity bar to keep the consistency across Microsoft 365 apps. It will also support the label colors defined by administrators.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Sensitivity Bar in Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description:
,Sensitivity bar provides a more prominent and
contextual user experience for viewing and applying sensitivity labels in Word,
Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook. Outlook on the web will be rolling out the new
sensitivity bar to keep the consistency across Microsoft 365 apps. It will also
support the label colors defined by administrators.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
OldVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Improvements for document library version history limits
OldVersion.description: ,We are introducing new version controls that help tenant and site admins or document library owners reduce the storage footprint driven by low value file versions. Today, document library owners can set count-based version limits at the individual document library level. With the upcoming changes, tenant and site admins or document library owners will have two version history settings: 1) Automatic mode that intelligently expires new and existing version based on their age and restore probability, and 2) Manual mode that will allow admins to set time-based version expiration and count limits on new and existing versions. These controls enable admins to set an appropriate level of recoverability and auditability for their organization balanced with storage usage considerations. Version history limits and management also apply to OneDrive for Business.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplifying Meeting Join Experiences on Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: We are improving the meeting join experience on mobile by 1) streamlining the meeting join process by reducing the number of steps it takes to join the meeting, particularly for users joining from externally of the organization, 2) users who join without signing in will now have the capability to preset and preview video / audio settings prior to joining the meeting, and 3) simplifying the join process for users with multiple accounts by improving the account switching user experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Simplifying Meeting Join Experiences on Mobile
OldVersion.description:
We are improving the meeting join experience on
mobile by 1) streamlining the meeting join process by reducing the number of
steps it takes to join the meeting, particularly for users joining from
externally of the organization, 2) users who join without signing in will now
have the capability to preset and preview video / audio settings prior to
joining the meeting, and 3) simplifying the join process for users with
multiple accounts by improving the account switching user experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Teams work meetings from Microsoft Teams (free) and vice versa
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables Microsoft Teams (free) users, those using a personal Microsoft Account, to directly join Teams for work meetings from within the client and stay connected even after the meeting has ended. This feature similarly also enables Microsoft Teams (work or school) users to join the Microsoft Teams (free) meetings directly from within the client.  These users are no longer prompted to join via a browser and treated as meeting guests (anonymous).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join Teams work meetings from Microsoft Teams (free) and vice versa
OldVersion.description:
This
feature enables Microsoft Teams (free) users, those using a personal Microsoft
Account, to directly join Teams for work meetings from within the client and
stay connected even after the meeting has ended. This feature similarly also
enables Microsoft Teams (work or school) users to join the Microsoft Teams
(free) meetings directly from within the client.  These users are no longer prompted to join
via a browser and treated as meeting guests (anonymous).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
CurrentVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Conditional Formatting in New Outlook for Windows and Web
OldVersion.description: Conditional formatting is a feature to make messages that meet defined conditions stand out in the message list by using different font colors. The users can specify conditions that an incoming message should meet, such as a sender’s name or email address.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios
CurrentVersion.description: New detections are being added to Communication Compliance that enables you to build safer online environments by detecting potential hate and violence then assigning severity scores to unsafe text across languages. These classifiers are built using large language models. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect business conduct and regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Advanced trainable classifiers to detect workplace safety scenarios
OldVersion.description: New detections are being added to Communication Compliance that enables you to build safer online environments by detecting potential hate and violence then assigning severity scores to unsafe text across languages. These classifiers are built using large language models. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance?provides the tools to help?organizations detect business conduct and?regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are?opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
CurrentVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - Review set query report
OldVersion.description: ,Within a review set, generate and download a hit-by-term report on a KQL query. Quickly see the count and volume of the items hit on a particular keyword or a list of compound queries.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
CurrentVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teachers can (manually) update parent data in Parent App
OldVersion.description: Allow teachers to add and edit existing parent data inside the Parent app. This request to update parent information can be directly made by teachers inside the Parent app. Once the request is raised, it needs an admin approval before updating the parent information in the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, advanced hunting, and custom detection email entity page take action
CurrentVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer, advanced hunting, custom detection and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: False positive email release from Quarantine through threat explorer, email summary panel, and email entity page take action
OldVersion.description: ,SecOps can now mange False positives and take move to inbox (i.e. release) quarantined messages from Threat explorer and Email entity page without the need to tab out to the Quarantine portal to take the action.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
CurrentVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - Overview page redesign
OldVersion.description: The Microsoft 365 admin center Usage report Overview page has been redesigned to better navigate the most important usage insights in your organization. The redesign includes new engagement metrics such as enabled and active users, user state compositions (e.g. first time, returning users), storage by product, and key usage metrics for Microsoft 365 products.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Control your mic state during meetings from Windows taskbar available in the new Teams on Windows
OldVersion.description: This feature, available in the new Teams experience on Windows, enables you to mute and unmute your audio by clicking the mic icon in Windows taskbar. To control your mic during the meeting from the taskbar, do the following: select the mic icon on your taskbar or press Windows logo key + Alt + K to mute or unmute.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Apps | Office Apps in Android applications can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the Android applications when the label is unencrypted.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Apps | Office Apps in Android applications can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the Android applications when the label is unencrypted.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Apps | Office Apps in iOS applications can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the iOS applications when the label is unencrypted.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Information Protection: Microsoft 365 Apps | Office Apps in iOS applications can create PDFs that inherit the source files sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: PDFs created from Word, Excel, and PowerPoint will inherit their source files sensitivity labels in Office for the iOS applications when the label is unencrypted.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Preset Organizational Backgrounds (Premium)
OldVersion.description: When enabled, a user will have a preset background defined by the IT admin without the ability to change the background.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
CurrentVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Sync feature
OldVersion.description: A button option to initiate email sync is coming to the new Outlook for Windows and Outlook on the web, this will allow users to ensure that their send and receive email experience is up-to-date. This functionality will be within the View tab of the Ribbon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v. 122 Moving Managed Site Indicator (Briefcase icon) into the lock icon in the address bar omnibox
CurrentVersion.description: The briefcase icon which signals that a page is managed, has been moved into the lock icon within the address bar. If an admin would like to see whether there are protections for a given page, they can click to open the lock icon in the address bar to look for the briefcase icon.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Moving Managed Site Indicator (Briefcase icon) into the lock icon in the address bar omnibox
OldVersion.description: The briefcase icon which signals that a page is managed, has been moved into the lock icon within the address bar. If an admin would like to see whether there are protections for a given page, they can click to open the lock icon in the address bar to look for the briefcase icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enriching Insider risk management with Communication compliance as an indicator
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enhance Insider Risk Management by incorporating communication compliance policy matches as a new indicator for detecting various communication risks, including inappropriate text. Additionally, our system now extends its capabilities to identify potential financial regulatory compliance breaches and violations of any custom communication compliance policy on Teams, Exchange, Yammer, Copilot, or third-party channels. This expansion ensures a comprehensive approach to risk detection in diverse communication scenarios.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Use Apple AirPods to mute/unmute yourself in Microsoft Teams
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams now works seamlessly with Apple AirPods to mute or unmute yourself on Mac models running macOS Sonoma. The same functionality already available on iPhone running iOS 17 is now supported on new Teams for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: New Stream app in Teams chat/channel’s tab
CurrentVersion.description: The Stream app that is accessed from the chat/channels ‘+’ icon to add a tab will be updated with the new Stream (on SharePoint) experience that will enable users to pin and watch a video or playlist from new Stream.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery Graph API for purge enhancements to include Exchange items and expand purge limit from 10 to 100
CurrentVersion.description: ,Now eDiscovery admins using the eDiscovery Graph APIs for purge to remove misplaced emails and or Teams messages from their storage locations can use the eDiscovery Graph API for both Exchange email items and Teams messages. In addition, the prior limit of 10 items per storage location will be expanded to 100 items per storage location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - eDiscovery premium: Enhancements to eDiscovery experience for Microsoft Forms content
CurrentVersion.description: Now admins can search for Microsoft Forms content specifically within their collections, see the full metadata associated to those items including the Form title, and review both the original Form and responses to the Form as related items within both review and export. Simplification and ease of use for managing Forms content via eDiscovery will help reduce the pain points of challenging discovery process and improve the confidence of organizations using Forms for critical tasks that may require eDiscovery capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Trainable Classifiers in Server Side Auto-labeling
CurrentVersion.description: Trainable Classifiers are now available for server side auto-labeling policies in exchange, OneDrive and SharePoint. In addition to the 15 Classifiers that are already available, we have now launched 23 more Trainable Classifier to detect sensitive content such as IP and Trade Secrets, sensitive documents pertaining to important business functions such as Finance, Sales, HR, and Material Non Public Information.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Teams Meeting Chat from Outlook
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This feature provides an easy Teams chat experience from Outlook in the context of a meeting for participants to send a quick message or review the chat.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Teams Meeting Chat from Outlook
OldVersion.description:
,This
feature provides an easy Teams chat experience from Outlook in the context
of a meeting for participants to send a quick message or review the chat.
